job.description: Task_ID: 79 Test DB:delete the CRD_* db's
job.name: DeleteCRD_Database

command.script:
sqlcmd -S %computername% -Q "IF EXISTS (SELECT name FROM master.dbo.sysdatabases WHERE name = N'ICD_DEV_MAIN' ) BEGIN PRINT N'Deleted ICD_DEV_MAIN' DROP DATABASE [ICD_DEV_MAIN] END ELSE PRINT N'ICD_DEV_MAIN is not exist'"
sqlcmd -S %computername% -Q "IF EXISTS (SELECT name FROM master.dbo.sysdatabases WHERE name = N'ICD_UAT_MAIN' ) BEGIN PRINT N'Deleted ICD_UAT_MAIN' DROP DATABASE [ICD_UAT_MAIN] END ELSE PRINT N'ICD_UAT_MAIN is not exist'"
sqlcmd -S %computername% -Q "IF EXISTS (SELECT name FROM master.dbo.sysdatabases WHERE name = N'ICD_STG_MAIN' ) BEGIN PRINT N'Deleted ICD_STG_MAIN' DROP DATABASE [ICD_STG_MAIN] END ELSE PRINT N'ICD_STG_MAIN is not exist'"
